title: Runtime generate code and load it, generics
body:
1.I would like to be able to load  packages ( plug-ins ) in runtime , to seek, to create objects for specific interfaces. I would like to dynamically generate code and use it (or|and to store)
(as in C#)
2. I would like to use templates or generics
(as in C#,C++)
(i know about interface {})

Do the developers plan to implement these features ?

Hello from Russia 
Thanks
Sorry for my english.
